name: Save The Fish
description:
Adventure arcade game based on ACTIVE RAGDOLLLLLLLLLL AND PURE TIME PRESSURE. You have to SAVE THE FISH to win the game. Your fishbowl is leaking and the only way to help your little friend is to throw it to the lake. Collect additional water refills and don't leak any additional water by falling. Have fun with physics and GOOD LUCK

How to Play:

  • W/S - Move
  • A/D - Rotate
  • F - Active Ragdoll On/Off
  • Esc/P - Pause (cool Slow-mo effect)
  • L-Shift - Run
  • Space - Jump

Everything you can see was made from scratch… except music - we are not musicians :). Music loop is Kevin MacLeod - Run Amok and SFX comes from https://freesound.org/

Tools:

  • Affinity Designer
  • Photoshop
  • Unity
  • Visual Studio
  • Blender 2.8
  • Materialize
